response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer is not just any item; it holds immense value to us and, I believe, to you as well. Given its unique attributes and the impact it could have on your endeavors, we are considering an asking price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its true worth, which we estimate to be around $1,200,000. We understand that such an investment requires careful consideration, and we are confident that this product will provide substantial returns and benefits for you. Should you decide to proceed, we assure you of our full support and commitment to ensuring a smooth transaction. We look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
